taskDescription: Development Process Planning: find out the scope of the problem and determine solutions
consider the functional requirements of the project or solution,analyzing the needs of the end users to ensure the new system can meet their expectations

end users to discuss and determine their specific business information needs for the proposed system,consider the essential components (hardware and/or software) structure (networking capabilities), processing and procedures for the system to accomplish its objectives.
Testing ,Repeatation, specifically to check for errors, bugs and interoperability
actual installation of the newly-developed system, putting the project into production by moving the data and components from the old system and placing them in the new system via a direct cutover
boost performance, add new capabilities or meet additional user requirements if there
